text: Igor Filipović (; born 17 April 1992) is a Serbian professional football defender who plays for Greek Football League club Aspropyrgos. ==References== ==External links== * * Igor Filipović stats at utakmica.rs * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Užice Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Čukarički players Category:FK Mladost Lučani players Category:FK Sileks players Category:FK Metalac Gornji Milanovac players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Macedonian First Football League players Category:Kuwait Premier League players
title: Igor Filipović
